About

The goal of the Computing Resources Unit is to provide the best possible customer service, application development, and technology infrastructure to support the business needs of the Deanâ€™s Office and the College of Agricultural & Environmental Sciences and its departments.

Mac Hardware Standards

CA&ES CRU Hardware Standards for Mac Desktops and Laptops

Mac Desktop

Apple iMac

  • Processor: 2.7Ghz Quad-core i5 processor
  • Memory: 8GB 1600MHz DDR3 Memory
  • Storage: 1TB Serial ATA Drive @5400rpm

PDF Factsheet


Mac Laptop

Apple Macbook Pro

  • Processor: 2.3Ghz Quad-core Intel Core i7 processor
  • Memory: 8GB 1600MHz DDR3 Memory
  • Storage: 500GB Serial ATA Drive @5400rpm

PDF Factsheet
